metadata.title: CVE-2023-32697 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
SQLite JDBC is a library for accessing and creating SQLite database filesin Java. Sqlite-jdbc addresses a remote code execution vulnerability viaJDBC URL. This issue impacting versions 3.6.14.1 through 3.41.2.1 and hasbeen fixed in version 3.41.2.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxerial-sqlite-jdbc-java - 3.44.1.0+dfsg-1build1
libxerial-sqlite-jdbc-jni - 3.44.1.0+dfsg-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xerial-sqlite-jdbc package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.44.1.0+dfsg-1build1').
